About C.V. Blog Publications Other

Ian Stewart

I am a postdoctoral research fellow at University of Michigan who is interested in building NLP systems that are more socially aware and helpful for writers.

News

  • 10.12.2020: I presented a tutorial at CORE Congress about exploratory text analysis for computational social science. Materials here.
  • 04.12.2020: Paper accepted at SCiL 2021! We investigated the integration of English loanwords into Spanish (e.g. the verb "tuitear" for "to tweet"). Preprint coming soon.
  • 01.09.2020: I have started work as a post-doctoral fellow at University of Michigan, working with the LIT Lab on socially-oriented NLP.
